data.name: Dark Iron
data.description:
Dark Iron Dwarf

Units:
15% spell damage reduction
-5% evasion

Buildings:
+10% hit points
-100 Tower range

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Traits: Well armored and strong army, highly proficient in pyromagic. Lots of burning over time area damage effects which slowly wither down the enemy. Be aware of severe lack of anti air devences though.

Difficulty: Expert

Type: Trolling

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

towerUpgrades.name: Sharp Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and damage to melee attacker
Affects: Zealot and Warthog

Lv1: +2 armor, 15 damage
Lv2: +4 armor, 30 damage
Lv3: +6 armor, 45 damage
Lv4: +8 armor, 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Ultimate Defence
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to reduce damage
Affects: Zealot

Lv1: 25% to reduce to 60
Lv2: 30% to reduce to 50
Lv3: 35% to reduce to 40
Lv4: 40% to reduce to 30

towerUpgrades.name: Volcano Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to splash fire
Affects: Gunner
(splashes in 150 AoE for 10 sec)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10%, -2 armor, 5 damage/sec
Lv2: 20%, -4 armor, 10 damage/sec
Lv3: 30%, -6 armor, 15 damage/sec
Lv4: 40%, -8 armor, 20 damage/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Living Bomb
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on kill
Affects: Pyromage
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 15 damage in 175 AoE
Lv2: 30 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 45 damage in 175 AoE
Lv4: 60 damage in 175 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Lava Fuel
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and area burn
Affects: Fire Golem, Warthog and Fire Tower
(burns in 125 AoE for 2 sec)

Lv1: +1 damage, 5 damage/sec
Lv2: +2 damage, 10 damage/sec
Lv3: +3 damage, 15 damage/sec
Lv4: +4 damage, 20 damage/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Devotion Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor to nearby units
Affects: Salamander Rider

Lv1: +3 armor in 400 AoE
Lv2: +6 armor in 400 AoE
Lv3: +9 armor in 400 AoE
Lv4: +12 armor in 400 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Magma Core
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: regeneration and damage after death
Affects: Fire Golem and Warthog
(burns in 250 AoE for 30 sec)

Lv1: 2 HP/sec, 5 damage/sec
Lv2: 4 HP/sec, 10 damage/sec
Lv3: 6 HP/sec, 15 damage/sec
Lv4: 8 HP/sec, 20 damage/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Devoted Fanatics
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Field Repairs (heals 1 unit)
restores 75/150/225/300 HP
(affects mechanical units only)
Lv2: has Toxic Gas (reduces regen)
-3/-6/-9 HP/sec in 325 AoE
(affects organic units only)
Lv3: has Mortar (attacks enemies)
summons 2 Towers for 60/90 sec
Lv4: has Flamethrower (area damage)
200 damage in 150 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Power of Sulfuras
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and armor per Hero
Affects: Ragnaros
(counts enemy Heroes on map)

Lv1: +4% damage, +1 armor per Hero
Lv2: +8% damage, +2 armor per Hero
Lv3: +12% damage, +3 armor per Hero
Lv4: +16% damage, +4 armor per Hero
